name: THE GRADUAL Illuminating Gradual Tan Lotion
about: Which skin type is it good for?.What it is:.Solutions for:.If you want to know moreu2026.What it is formulated WITHOUT:
ingredients: -Raspberry Seed Oil: Moisturizes and conditions..-Aloe Vera: Soothes and moisturizes..-Cellutone Complex: Gives the look of firmer skin...Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Propylene Glycol, Dihydroxyacetone, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Erythrulose, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Aloe Barbedensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil,  Melanin, Xanthan Gum, Benzophenone-3, Benzophenone-4, Hydrolyzed Silk, Lecithin, Caffeine, Palmitoyal Carnitine, Fragrance, Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Tetrasodium EDTA, Glycerin, Caramel, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Dehydroacetic Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to the skin in a circular motion from head to toe..-Thoroughly wash hands after use... Precautions:.-A patch test 24 hours before use is advised..-Do not apply on broken or irritated skin..-Avoid contact with eyes. If reaction occurs, discontinue use and seek medical advice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am fair and this gives me a very nice natural tan. I apply with my hands and finish off with a tan mit to ensure no streaking. The smell is not great and pretty strong so I would caution this product if you are senior smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the convenience of lotion-based tanners so this is great for me! It works quickly and leaves an instantly noticeable colour! However, beware that this product is not travel-friendly so it doesn't leave the house with me, which is a huge bummer considering the convenience of the application. I took this on vacation and thank goodness I secured it in a ziploc bag because it leaked on the way there, and back even after feeling like I did everything I could to secure it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tanner! Iu2019m quite pale so it gives me just the right amount of tan to not seem too sudden. I use it once or twice a week after showering, depending on how tanned I want to be. Iu2019ll use this forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely liquidy and hard to apply! Results arenu2019t worth the headache of the application and itu2019s very easy to have streaks, misses because it goes on so watery. Do not buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is exactly what it says (Gradual). I have pretty fair skin, with 3 applications I had a nice even tan. I love that if you miss a spot one day you can get that spot the next. The only down fall like all self tans is the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best tans, and it moisturizes your skin and helps it illuminate. So beautiful and easy to apply before a night out (could not live without this and their Butter too).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best ever!! Keeps my tan for so long (Months!!!!) this is my second time purchasing this and Iu2019m so happy I gave it a shot. P.S. works much better if you already have a tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this! You wonu2019t notice it directly after application but within a few hours youu2019ll have a beautiful glow to your skin. Itu2019s a subtle, natural looking tan. I can put it on and go straight to bed and it wonu2019t stain my white sheets.

reviews.review_title: Gradual for sure, but great in the end
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Takes quite a few days of repetitive use to see a result, but when applied properly, it leaves an even tanned hue that isnu2019t orange at all (unlike so many others).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tan looks nice, but it takes a thick coat to achieve a full application and deposit colour evenly, and the result does not last long. I leave my tan on for 72 hours and it starts to wash off in patches immediately with your next shower. Look for a different option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin colour is light / fair and this does nothing for me. It doesnu2019t even give me a little bit of colour. Itu2019s just expensive cream.

reviews.review_title: Iu2019ve had better luck with drug store tanner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I read in the reviews it doesnu2019t come full, true.Product doesnu2019t fill the bottle.It is watery and the applying with hands(which is the only way because of itu2019s consistency) left streaks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The application was easy but I needed to use a lot to actually cover my whole body. I donu2019t think this will last very long. I really wanted to love it but the colour was also SO orange on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product for my vacation and it turned out very streaky, blotchy and even rubbed off in certain areas while I was sleeping. I have used another tan lux product in the past and was very impressed, this one was not good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I already have a tan from being in Mexico and want to keep it! Tried it last night and it amped up my tan again. Only complaint is for the price point I wish the bottle came totally full for the price point. Mine was at least half an inch of empty space at the top.

reviews.review_title: Staple in my PM routine. Year round.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for 2 years. I do love it, adds a gradual glow and even better to prolong a natural tan. Minimal smell w just a touch of glitter. No transfer but need to scrub your hands after.  Removed a star because I expect the bottle to actually came full

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! I am already a little tan so this just amplified my tan and gave me a really great glow! Zero streaks! Great if you have a natural base tan and just want to be a little extra tan and glow.

reviews.review_title: Will never stop using this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I NEVER EVER write reviews, because whou2019s got the time? Plus there hasnu2019t been any product that has deserved a review. At least a positive review! But wow this tanning lotion. I, like many girls love to tan, but donu2019t want the damage of tanning beds and laying under the sun. Iu2019ve used many different tanning lotions and always have the same issue: 1. The product is not dark enough or natural 2. I have to leave it on for hours, and they ALWAYS stain my sheets and clothes 3. Are streaky or fade streaky 4. Theyu2019re sticky and annoy me all day so I end up washing it before it gets to the level I want.  Now this tan lotion from tan luxe 1. I donu2019t even have to exfoliate my skin before I apply and it still goes on streak free 2. The texture is amazing, it allows me to blend it perfectly and donu2019t have to rub it in for long before it gets absorbed 3. Within 2 hours Iu2019m noticeably darker and the next day very tanned 4. It stays on for a while without fading and it fades very gradually and without getting patchy 5. You only need to use a little to see results. 6. It smells great when you apply, as it develops it has only the mildest hint of tanning lotion, and itu2019s not sticky as it dries. Iu2019m curious to try the tanning drops for the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for the person who hates to tan it is really easy to use! I put it on at night and two applications I get my desired colour. Not streaky and the fake tan smell is not there. It is a very liquid product so it does take getting used to. My skin feels so hydrated when I have it on.

Gives a nice subtle tan/glow but it does have a strong self tan scent. Seems minimal when first smelling/applying but the scent ends up getting stronger as the tan develops. Also the tan takes about 6 hours to start developing rather then the 2 it says on the bottle. The formula is very liquidy which I actually like since it dries down very quickly. Overall a good purchase if you like gradual tanners and donu2019t mind the self tan scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So liquid it always get on the floor and iu2019m half the bottle & never saw a bit of a tan. 10$ jergens works better than this at 44$. Itu2019s a big no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a subscription box 2 years ago and Iu2019ve been using it ever since. Itu2019s super easy and smooth to apply and a light natural tan! If you rub it in good enough there will be no streaks or missed spots. I love this tanner and will keep buying it forever. Iu2019m very white and it looks amazing, not too dark at all and takes a minute to dry so you can go on with your day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fairly splotchy. Will try to use up but wonu2019t buy again.

reviews.review_title: 4 stars- More of a proper self tanner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not necessarily gradual but still a lovely self tanner. Constancy is fluid which makes it easy to get an even thin application. Doesnu2019t smell overly u201cself tanneru201d like which is nice. I would caution to treat this less like a drugstore daily-self-tan-lotion and more like a proper self tanner especially in regards to skin prep, moisturizing dry spots and careful application. Overall really happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not gradual and very dark. I am fair skinned so I tested it on the inside of my wrist - definitely do this!!! It was so much darker than I expected it to be. After a few days it was gone.
